events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their vehicle at an intersection causing significant front-end damage.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on keywords found in the initial report and documentation.
A claims agent was assigned promptly to handle the customer's auto accident case to ensure swift processing.
The customer received confirmation that the auto accident claim has been acknowledged and is under review.
We requested additional documentation including police report and photos of the vehicle damage to proceed.
The claimant submitted all requested documents including the police report and detailed pictures of the accident scene.
Investigation of the auto accident claim has begun, focusing on verifying damages and liability coverage.
The investigation concluded with a full assessment of vehicle damages and confirmation of fault assigned appropriately.
A settlement offer was made to the customer based on the assessed repair costs and insurance policy limits.
The customer responded to the settlement proposal with some questions about coverage details and payment timing.
The claim was formally approved following clarification and acceptance of the settlement terms by the customer.
Payment was issued to the claimantâ€™s account covering all repair and loss expenses as agreed in the settlement.
The auto accident claim was closed successfully after full reimbursement and resolution of customer inquiries.
All claim records and documents were archived systematically for future reference and regulatory compliance.
